Name: aar-sheikhmahmoudab
Author: Sheikh Mahmoud Abdel Qader Hamz And Group Of Scholars

Translations.Text: Diggah Nabiyow Qhuraan oobisiyyah nanu ninnih kol oobisne
Nabiyow Ku Rabbih meklal isbiraay, korosuk dambit kaxaxah yan marih yab moggolinaay hinnay koroosannuu kee maxqawitit caddok tatreh yan marih yab moggolin
Kaadu ku Rabbih migaq Carraay, saaku xag
Kaadu barak tut kaah kummaataay, barak xer waktit salat kaah ab
Diggah tama mari (koros kinnuk) sissik tiya (addunya kinnuk) kicnoonuuh, qilsi ayroy ellecabol ken qambalta cabaanah (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
Nanu ken ginneeh gino keenik karriqqi hayne, kaadu nanu bayisnam fannek, bayissi ken hayneh ken innah yan maray kayrih keenik yayse ciggiilisiyyah ciggiilisenno
Diggah tama suurá seehadah kassiisi, toysa isi nafsih maqaané faxe num, isi Rabbih gita yabbixe, iimaan kee meqe taamál
Isin caagiidak hebeltô caagidiy faxxaana manton, Yalli faxeh akķke waytek, diggah Yalli isi ginô caaloota yaaxigi, abba haamal naggaar kinni
Yalli isi naqoosak isih faxe mara isi Racmat (jannat kinnuk) culsa, kaadu daalimiinih (koros kinnuk) akeeral qansarissa digaalá massoyse
